Dominant function:
ğŸ” Watermark-free ad download: Say goodbye to tedious watermark processing and directly download high-quality ad videos without watermarks.
ğŸ’¾ One-click batch ad download: Quickly select and download multiple ad videos and ad images, saving time and effort and improving work efficiency
ğŸ”— Unlimited ad sharing: Easily share ad video links with team members, partners, or friends to broaden ad creative collaboration.
ğŸ“Š Ad Video Data Analysis: View key ad data such as CTA, likes, and categories to help you gain a deeper understanding of ad video performance.
ğŸ·ï¸ Customize ad tags and ad comments: Add personalized tags and comments to ad videos for easy management and search.
ğŸ“‚ Ad video management: Provide convenient ad storage, ad organization, and ad management functions to keep your ad video library organized.

How to use it?
1ï¸âƒ£ Click on the extension icon to quickly access the LinkedIn page.
2ï¸âƒ£ Browse and select your favorite video, select the ad folder, click the "Save" button, and you can easily save the ad to your library.
3ï¸âƒ£ On the ad library platform, you can view saved ad videos at any time and select watermark-free ad downloads.
4ï¸âƒ£ Use the personal library function to classify and manage ad videos, and share links with others.

ğŸ”’ Security Guarantee: This plugin is completely secure and will not collect your privacy information. Please feel free to use it!
ğŸ” Legality Statement: This ad video downloader is for personal use only. Please make sure not to engage in any illegal activities. If you need to share or use it for commercial purposes, please comply with relevant laws and regulations and obtain the author's consent in advance.
ğŸ“¢ Disclaimer: As an independent Google tool, Ad Library is not affiliated with LinkedIn or its product line. This ad video downloader is independently developed and operated by our team, aiming to provide users with a brand new experience. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
Experience LinkedIn Ad Video Master now and take control of amazing ad videos!
